scripts.say: ...Now then, while I totally didn't expect you all to just sit around and play games all day, it seems you did investigate as I told you to. You have done well.

Thanks to your investigation I was able to understand the gist of what the connection is between Gamindustri and this other world. From now on you should be able to access this world whenever you want.
Woo-hoo! I knew you could do it, Histy! So then... can we just stay here forever?
...What are you on about? We obviously can't do that.
She's right. Gamindustri won't last very long without us CPUs to watch over it.
Vert is correct. You can all return here whenever you want, so please, all of you come back to Gamindustri at once. And that includes you, Neptune.
Sigh Being a big-shot CPU loved by everyone sure is tough... Fiiiine, I'll come back home.
For a while I had no idea how we'd manage in this world... But we did, somehow. We couldn't have done it alone though. Thank you for helping us out so much, everyone.
Yeah! Thank you, Laffey, Javelin, Ayanami, Z23... And everyone else here at the academy! We owe you, big time!
Also... It was tons of fun hanging out with you guys!
Yeah... It was really fun.
I had a great time too. I'd love to have another exciting discussion about games with you, Nep-Nep.
Oh, you wanna do that? Stay up all night talking about games, again?
...We don't have time for that. We gotta get going.
Leaving Gamindustri without CPUs for too long isn't very good.
Though it pains us all... I suppose you must leave now...
Just after we'd all become such close friends... It's a shame.
Yeah, I don't want to leave either... But I've got Lastation to take care of, and I promise we'll meet again.
Thank you, Z23 and Ayanami. I'm glad I got the chance to meet you.
Come on, guys... Let's just stay one more night while we're still here! I've gotten hooked on Oxy-Cola and Torpedo Tempura... And I need my daily dose!
Oh, right! I packed some lunch for you, Nep-Nep. I filled it with Torpedo Tempura just for you. I hope you'll like it!
Wowzers! Thanks, Javelin! Holy moley, there's like a dozen Oxy-colas in here! We could all have 3 each!
Uh, yeah... You can have mine, Neptune.
You can't quite drink them, I see... They're intended for consumption by shipgirls only, not even our commander can handle drinking them.
...But I remember Nep-Nep downing a whole bottle. Maybe she has the same taste as we do?
Now then, CPUs, please line up in front of the wormhole and prepare to jump into it.
I can't simply leave an inter-dimensional wormhole open here, so once you're done saying goodbye, I will close it for the time being.
When you have business in this world, I can open it again, so you don't need to worry about that.
Yeah, I guess you're right... Z23, Ayanami, thank you once again. We all had our ups and downs, but I enjoyed myself too.
I couldn't agree more. There are no words to express my gratitude. Thank you for everything, Noire.
I had fun too. Sayonara, Noire.
Mutsuki, Kisaragi, Uzuki... I'll be back before you know it! And I'll bring you girls more candy than you could ever dream of!
Okay, Vert! I'm gonna dream of tons of candy while you're gone!
We'll be waiting... Bye bye, Vert!
Bye byyyyeee!
Ahhh... You're all so lovely! I wish I didn't have to return home!
Sigh... I don't either, I've barely even started on reading the books from this world... I could never get bored of talking with Künne either...
We'll wait for you as long as it takes, Miss Blanc...!
I will patiently wait for your glorious return, Miss Blanc!
It seems we all got to know each other and now nobody wants you to leave....
Haha, yeah, it seems so... For better or worse, you've helped us increase our shares as well, so we should be able to remain active in this world unhindered.
You deserve my thanks too, Laffey and Javelin! I promise we'll be back, in one way or another! Let's meet again sometime!
Hey, don't say anything that'll make them expect too much.
This journey of ours was quite an extraordinary experience...
...Hearing that raises a bunch of warning flags in my head.
Yeah... I'll be waiting for your return, Nep-Nep.
As will I! I hope you'll still have fun back home in Gamindustri...!
I will. Thanks! I'm always finding ways to have fun no matter where I am, so don't worry! And I promise I'll be back to have even more fun with you guys... So just wait for me until then!
Well then, buh-bye!
